Calais‚ÄìDunkerque Airport (French: A√©roport de Calais - Dunkerque) is an airport located in Marck, 7 km (4 mi) east-northeast of Calais, in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region of France. The airport also serves Dunkerque (a commune in the Nord department).
